name: Gooey Grilled Cheese
description: Grilled cheese and tomato soup—name a more iconic duo, we’ll wait. Now, not to mess with a classic, but why not skip all the grilling, flipping, and dunking, and get right to the good stuff? Pour tomato soup over assembled sammies and bake ‘em for some hands-off prep. It’s a lunchtime win for kids and a trip down nostalgia lane for the young at heart.

ingredients.name: CCB Dip Mix or Herb & Garlic Dip Mix

preparation: Preheat oven to 400° F. Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner.

In a small bowl, combine cream cheese with dip mix. Spread onto 6 slices of bread. Top with cheese slices and remaining bread. Spread the outside of each slice of bread with 1 tsp butter. Arrange on pan.
In a large bowl, whisk eggs. Gradually whisk in soup. Pour over sandwiches and top with cheese.
Bake 20 min, or until golden brown. Let stand on pan 10 min.
Slice sandwiches in half diagonally to serve.

products.name: CCB Dip Mix
summary: Cheese. Chives. Bacon. How's that for a totally irresistible trio? Our very own smoky vegetarian bacon, made from pinto beans, is the secret star of this oh-so-yummy dip.
This blend is all about versatility and we recommend taking it way beyond the dip bowl—use CCB in any dish that could use a little levelling up.

products.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
summary: Classic notes of chives, parsley, & garlic.

products.name: Tomato Soup Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: If you could pour nostalgia into a bowl, it would look and taste like Tomato Soup. With a distinctive sweet and tangy tomato flavour and velvety texture, this blend is sugar and sodium-conscious and gluten free. Nutritional yeast brings creaminess to a soup that only requires two ingredients, tomato paste and water, and 20 minutes to make. The only thing to add is a grilled cheese sandwich!

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
